name: Lillian Paris
content: Passionate about providing a useful perspective on user interfaces as well as constructing applications in group settings. Known as a contemporary problem solver always in search for a new project, with a focus on user friendlyness and development. With each project, my ambition is to deploy quality applications for an impactful user experience.
